properties.markdownProperty:
**YAML file defines context example**
translation.yaml content:
``` main_window.title: "Proteus application" archetype: class: section: "Section" paragraph: "paragraph" ```
Translator output for the following codes:
- `main_window.title` --> "Proteus application" (Found) - `main_window.text` --> "main_window.text" (Not found) - `archytpe.class.section` --> "Section" (Found) - `archetype.class.objective` --> "objective" (Not found, two contexts match) - `archetype.name.section` --> "name.section" (Not found, one context match - `class.section` --> "class.section" (Not found)
